channel.title: Switch magics command
channel.description: does anyone have the code for the command that switches your magics from normal magics to ancients? then ancients to normal?

item.title: Switch magics command
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:2, topic:281340”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch")) { RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }[/quote]

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch")) { if(ancients == 1) { setSideBarInterface(6, 1551); // Normal magic. ancients = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!"); else setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); ancients = 1; sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

Read full topic
